texto: These processes operate in a proactive manner and contribute to the achievement of the organization’s objectives, including the fulfilment of statutory and regulatory requirements. 5 The way in which infrastructure and the work environment are managed becomes a key contributor in the achievement of desired results. a Items outlined in levels 3 to 5 are intended to be a progression of thought that is based on the guidance provided in the applicable subclause. b This may include recognition of aspects where the organization is partially meeting a maturity level. --`,,,``,`,`,`,`,`````,,-`-``,```,,,`--- 44  Copyright International Organization for Standardization ﻿ Order Number: 02315644 © ISO
